name: JWLanguageCount
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The most translated website in the world adds new language support on a weekly basis. Install this flash briefing to get a short update about how many languages it currently supports on a daily basis.

Skill icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com. It is licensed by CC 3.0 BY.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
